collection.body:
Beliyf

Beliyf are organisational culture and identity specialists. Their mission is to help companies articulate who they are, and why they matter. I was commissioned to rebrand Beliyf as well as design their web presence. I wrote a post about the design thinking behind this project and you can read it on Medium.
